alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 1:39PM CST until February 25 at 12:52PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to a crest of 26.7 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 26.0 22.4 Mon 1 pm CST 25.5 26.7 26.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 9 PM CST.
